content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM helps Epic Games to build an RTC platform based on the WebRTC technology to connect video/audio/data between browsers and native apps with a latency less than 1 sec. EPAM delivers the solution end-to-end, starting from requirements gathering and architecture design to development, testing, and deployment to production.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":35450,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1f350cda-8ee8-4745-b3ef-7a5075060161/16.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1f350cda-8ee8-4745-b3ef-7a5075060161/16.JPG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"16.JPG\",\"name\":\"16.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"1f350cda-8ee8-4745-b3ef-7a5075060161\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":670,\"height\":532},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
